mapper.insert: insert into eval_article(uni_num, team_id, article1, article2, article3, article4, article5, article6, article7, article_opinion1, article_opinion2, article_opinion3, article_opinion4, article_opinion5, article_opinion6, article_opinion7) values(${uni_num}, #{team_id}, #{article1}, #{article2}, #{article3}, #{article4}, #{article5}, #{article6}, #{article7}, #{article_opinion1}, #{article_opinion2}, #{article_opinion3}, #{article_opinion4}, #{article_opinion5}, #{article_opinion6}, #{article_opinion7})
mapper.select: select team_name, team_id from team where team_id != 0
select uni_num, name from user where authorization = 2 or authorization = 3
